From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

ãPhone’s Safe Like in an Infant SeatãThis car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
ã0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operationã andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
ã360Â° Flexible Rotation as Wishã Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360Â° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
ãWide Compatible with All Smartphonesã This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
ãAndobil Car Phone Holder Serviceã Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.


Compatible with All Cellphones in 4â-7â size:

iPhone Series Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 12 Pro,12,12 Mini, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8 Plus, 8, X, XS max, XS, XR, 7 Plus, 7, etc.

ãSuper Quiet & Low Vibrationã: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
ã2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Portsã: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.

ãPortable Cordless &USB Rechargeableã: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating
Against-chew Cord and Washable Velvet Cover: This heating pad for cats uses a bite-proof protective sleeve at the junction of the power cord and the steel cord is 2.1 meters which can withstand 5 KG pull.Quick-drying Soft cover can be take out easily and cleaned by hand
Comfortable and Warming: This heated pet mat can be used in pet houses and nests, also suitable for senior pets, arthritic pets, new born pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury. Help the pet (dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) to keep warm and comfortable in cold winter

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

7 Layer Protection Structure

BurgeonNest pet heating pad is made of soft velvet, refractory wool, MET approved heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure & completely sealed, offers pet’s the most comfortable temperature range ( 86-131â/30-55â).

High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature, and the dog heated pad will automatically stop working for prevent overheating.

PVC Waterproof Material

Cat bed heater with IP68 Waterproof liner protects from stains and odors etc. It is waterproof material won’t fade, and the material is hardwearing and won’t rip.

Dual Resistant Chew Cord

Cats usually sniff, lick and chew objects to explore everything, this cat warmer pad comes with a steel-wrapped cord to protect dog safety.

Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

The soft velvet cover is removable, so you can machine wash it.

How to Clean: Remove the cover and wash it with hand or washing machine. Do not plug in until the heated pet pad is completely dry.

Product Description

PULIVIA 2022 Upgraded Snowflake Projector Light for Christmas

Christmas Snowflake Projector Light

PULIVIA Snowflake Projector light is your perfect choice for Christmas New Year.This Christmas outdoor projector light with three types of snowflake patterns including “Large Snowflake” + “Small Snowflake” + “Snow Dots”. Snowflakes moving in rotation, create a strong sense of space.The outdoor projector light is great for holiday decoration, such as Xmas, New Year weddings, Thanksgiving, birthday parties which makes it a very popular choice.This decoration projector light is a nice gift for you family Christmas.

Christmas Projector Light Outdoor

The projector light comes with 3 Installation Methods and Working Scenarios:

Mounted on the wall for outdoor or indoor;Installed on the grass for outdoor;Place on the table for indoor.

Adjustable Projecting Angle

The Christmas projector light can be adjusted the projection angle, you can adjust it 0 – 180 degree as you need.

Waterproof IP65

PULIVIA snowflake projector lights have a waterproof function: light is IP65 and plug is IP44;The working temperature is -20â-50â, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow;The power adapter is not waterproof.

Package List

1 X LED Light Projector1 X Power Adapter1 X Ground Stake1 X Mounting Plate1 X Fixed Screws1 X Support Frame1 X User Manual

Specification:

Color Black Material ABS, LED Power Consumption 4W (safer than other style) Input Voltage 100-240V AC 50/60HZ Output voltage 14V/0.3A(Low Voltage, very safe) Light Source LED Light Power cord 5m/16.5ft Waterproof Grade light is IP65, Protection Grade: plug is IP44 Operating Temperature -20 Â°C To 50 Â°C

Pay Attention:

The best projection distance is 16.5 – 26ftï¼5-8mï¼.

ãIP65 Waterproof and Easy to Installã— PULIVIA Christmas projector light is made of high-quality ABS material, IP65 waterproof, and the working temperature is -20â-50â, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow. It comes with a round base and a long ground stake, so it can be either staked in the grass or installed indoor. Ultra-long 5m/16.5ft power cable will easily reach most house outlets where you set it up.
ãIndoor and Outdoor Projector Lightã— PULIVIA Upgraded snowflake projector light is widely used in Halloween, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, bars, weddings, family gatherings, etc. Suitable for decorating your garden, house, fence, trees, etc. 7 meter cable can be easily connected and can install indoors or outdoors. The projection distance of the snow lamp is 9.8ft–65.6ft and the best projection range is 16ft—26ft.
ãBrighter Clearer and Large Projection Areaã— This Christmas projection light is brighter and clearer than other similar snowflake projectors. PULIVIA snowflake projector light is the good choice for your Christmas.
ãSafe Projector and Beautiful Decorationã— This snowflake projection light uses high-quality LED lights, with soft and comfortable lighting. Beautiful snowflake decoration, creating a perfect Christmas atmosphere. If you have any questions about this romantic snow light, please contact us via amazon. Our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours.
